issue.title: [C++] Fix string description of tensor IPC messages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12041](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12041). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Calling `ipc::FormatMessageType` on an IPC message of type tensor or sparse tensor currently returns "unknown".

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12041?focusedCommentId=17306221) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9655
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9655>
